body_html: That's true, but I'm still pretty sure that there are still some pretty significant savings waiting there. Yes, doing that only once in __init__ would be the best, but I don't think there's any way to do it in general. We might need some cleverness to improve/simplify replicate. I have some pretty complicated ideas that could solve it, but would like to see if there's nothing simpler that would help.

body: That's true, but I'm still pretty sure that there are still some pretty significant savings waiting there. Yes, doing that only once in `__init__` would be the best, but I don't think there's any way to do it in general. We might need some cleverness to improve/simplify `replicate`. I have some pretty complicated ideas that could solve it, but would like to see if there's nothing simpler that would help.
